ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of TAMARA ROWANNE VROOMAN of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a special adviser to the Minister of Environment and the Minister of Finance, to be styled co -Chair of the Advisory Council on Climate Action, to hold office during pleasure, on a part time basis, for a term of six months.
